radiographic_examinations.findings: The right kidney was 11.2 cm in length and the left kidney 11.1 cm, with normal parenchyma and no hydronephrosis or masses.
Dense vitritis obscuring the posterior pole; subretinal purulent material consistent with abscess.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Five days after vitrectomy, visual acuity improved to 20/400; 9 months later, improved to 20/60.
